other_title: Tenpō Ibun Ayakashi Ayashi: Ayashi Shinkyoku (Japanese)
天保異聞 妖奇士 奇士神曲 (Japanese)
plot: Six months after the events of the first series, Ryuudou Yukiatsu, the wielder of Ayagami, the power to fight demon beasts known as "Youi," and his companions the Ayashi are brought back together to fight a new menace and conspiracy that will decide the fate of not only Ryuudou but also the rest of the Ayashi.
